markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Selfless Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=1958) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 171 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=58)

**Prerequisites**
[Dueling Parry (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=367); [Duelist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1956)

</column>

---

You protect those near you with a flash of steel. When you're benefiting from [Dueling Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=367), allies adjacent to you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. If you have [Dueling Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=389), you can use it when an enemy within your reach critically fails a Strike against an ally adjacent to you, not just against yourself.
name: Selfless Parry
